title: Box alignment in multi-column layout
summary: The box alignment specification details how alignment works in various layout methods; on this page we explore how Box Alignment works in the context of multi-column Layout. As this page aims to detail things which are specific to Multi-column Layout and Box Alignment, it should be read in conjunction with the main box alignment page which details the common features of Box Alignment across layout methods.
pageTitle: Box alignment in multi-column layout - CSS: Cascading Style Sheets | MDN
